amendment.description: Amendment sought to strike sec. 8121 which prohibits the use of funds for proposing, planning, or executing a new Base Realignment and Closure (BRAC) round.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 16 printed in House Report 114-623 to strike Section 8121, which prevents the use of funds for proposing, planning, or executing a new Base Realignment and Closure (BRAC) round.

vote.text: On agreeing to the O'Rourke amendment (A015) Failed by recorded vote: 157 - 263 (Roll no. 310).

action.text: Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
Roll call votes on amendments in House
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the O'Rourke amendment (A015) Failed by recorded vote: 157 - 263 (Roll no. 310).
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A015) offered by Mr. O'Rourke.
